title: Unemployment rises when part-timers quit jobs

content.prompt: An increase in the number of which of the following will lead to an increase in the unemployment rate?

choices.label: Persons working 30 instead of 40 hours per week
Persons quitting part-time jobs to look for full-time ones

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
